msbt.message: <10_10 />Is that you, ?!<10_9 /> Wow! It's been like <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="whole year" c="years" />! You're looking really buff too! Nice!I've been training super hard too. Wanna have a weightlifting contest? Ha! Just kidding. You'd lose.It's so great to see you again! We should get together for a workout!

<10_10 />Is that you, ?! No way!<10_9 /> It's been like Whoa! <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" /> and <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />!I swore if I ever saw you again, I'd make you do ten thousand squats but you can do those later.Right now, I'm just pumped to see you again, !

Yo! Nice to meet you! My name's !I'm big into fitness, but I bet that was obvious. I was just about to Hang on. I know you, right?<10_10 />Oh! ! Hey!<10_9 />Wow! How've you been? What's your bench weight up to? I missed you, bud.Don't run off like that again. Or tell me if you do so we can make it a race, !

Hey Anyone ever said you look like ?Oh, it IS you!<10_10 /> Hey, next time you run off to some super-secret fitness camp, don't forget me!<10_9 />Not that I need it. Check out my abs! And my biceps! And Actually, we can compare muscles later.Welcome back, !

Yo! ! Been a while!You haven't been skipping workouts, have you? I can always tell.Rememberâ€”fitness is life. You can't skip a single day, especially leg day. If you're not sore, you're not living!Whew! Just sayin' that gets me pumped. I'm gonna go do some extra sets! See you around!
! You're back! How'd your octuple marathon go?What? You didn't run an octuple marathon? Ha! I knew you'd bring me if it was something like that!
Hey, ! It's been too long, !I was testing a new workout routine, but it's been tough to stay motivated without you around.
Yo, ! Haven't caught up with you in a while.I suppose I could've come by your place to chat Believe it or not, I'm actually kinda shy, .
Heya, ! It's been a while. Did you go back to the mainland?Huh? You haven't left the island? But I've been swim training for weeks to come visit you!
What's up, ? Haven't talked to you in a while. You kinda ghosted on me there.Hey, you ever wondered how ghosts get ripped? Do you think they do deadlifts?
